verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How big is a mustard seed
all the faith you will need
to move a mountain to the sea
will fit inside that seed

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus said it's so sad to me
when you walk in unbelief
everything's a possibility
with faith no bigger than a mustard seed

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
A mustard seed would be hard to measure
it's smaller than a speck
lighter than a feather
but this truth should make us feel better
it's the size of God that matters
